OnConnect.AddIRCMessage: !ANNOUNCEMENT! CHANNEL IS ACTIVE @channel
This guy wants you to attack NLH hospital? With some kind of a ransomware if I am seeing things right?
Yes, NightHawks are moving in right now, and they want to plant ransomware on life support units. They assigned me to the most difficult ones
They want to use ransomware to extort NLH hospital? For 75 grand each unit?
Exactly
That hospital doesn't have so much money, they recently paid to Kellis BioTech for new equipment
Then everybody who is connected to life support units will die. NightHawks want to become a famous group and enter high league of hackers so they won't hesitate
What a fucking morons
I know that already Clara, can we do something about that??
For fuck sake, I am thinking!
Ok, I have a somewhat of a plan
I am all ears
I will contact NLH security and warn them about attack but of course they won't make any sudden moves

Also I will reverse-engineer that .bat file and will send them a security patch. Life support units won't be in danger of deactivation and your buddies will think that everything is fine and working as it should be, except that they can't actually kill anyone
It will look like a mistake of someone who made that ransomware, your group won't suspect you
And I assume that I must continue executing my part of operation?
Yes. Do what they said you to do
People won't die, so make it look like you did your job right, and the guy who made .bat file will look faulty
Ok, I will resume the operation, but what about the client?
Enforcers are ready to move out at his location as soon as people at the hospital would be safe

Got it. Thank you Clara. You just saved a lot of people. But we have another problem. I was right, Omicron is back, check all available information, scan all your sources, we need to get to him, he is preparing for some kind of an operation or an attack
I still think that is a nonsense, Captain, but I will check it out
Thanks again
Now go, complete that operation of your lunatic friends
I won't befriend with some neo-nazi scum
Good. I will be in touch
!ANNOUNCEMENT! CHANNEL IS CLOSED @channel
